title: Interaction Element Clicked Event Data
description: Data payload for the interaction.element_clicked event. Fired when a user clicks on a tracked UI element.

elementId.description: The HTML id attribute of the clicked element.

elementClass.description: The CSS class(es) of the clicked element.

elementTag.description: The HTML tag name of the clicked element.

elementText.description: The visible text content of the clicked element, truncated if necessary.

targetUrl.description: The destination URL if the clicked element is a link.

region.description: The page region where the element is located, e.g. header, sidebar, footer.

component.description: The name of the UI component containing the clicked element.
